Name: Coffin of Queen Khedeb-Neith-yer-bone
Description: This massive granite coffin lid belongs to the queen mother and king's wife Khedeb-Neith-yer-bone, consort of Nectanebo I. It is impressive testimony of the achievements of the Late Period. The hieroglyphs, in five columns, list the titles and name, after which follows a prayer to the sky goddess Nut.
